entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022
